abstract: Handlebars column review of Piaggio MP3 400 three-wheel scooter.
snippet: A drawback of motorcycles and scooters is that they can fall over, but Piaggio may have a solution. Its MP3 scooter uses two front wheels and a suspension and steering system that lets those wheels tilt together with the machine.
lead_paragraph: A drawback of motorcycles and scooters is that they can fall over, but Piaggio may have a solution. Its MP3 scooter uses two front wheels and a suspension and steering system that lets those wheels tilt together with the machine.

headline.main: Adding Sport to Scooters With a 3-Wheel Design
headline.print_headline: Adding Sport to Scooters With a 3-Wheel Design
headline.seo: Adding Sport to Scooters With a 3-Wheel Design
